title: TLG (Thesaurus Linguae Graecae) CD with Diogenes 3.1.6
description:
TLG (Thesaurus Linguae Graecae) is one of the most valuable philosophical and philological information available right now.It has millions of ancient greek and latin texts and inscriptions.You can borrow it from the University which made it for 600$ per 5 years.That's the reason i'm uploading it,because there are people who don't have the money to get the knowledge in their hands.Knowledge should always be free.

I'm also uploading diogenes v.3.1.6 to open the texts because else you can't,since they are encrypted.

Instructions: 1.Unzip 2.Place the extracted folder in the root of your hard drive so that the path is easy for the program 3.Run diogenes 4.Try to search for something and a window will open asking for the path to the texts 5.Click either on the (TLG) folder or inside him the (TLG-E) folder 6.You are ready.

Knowledge should always be free.
